channel.title: Atikmdag?
channel.description: Well, I play Second Life occasionally, and after about 5 minutes of gameplay it crashes. In the taskbar I get a message saying atikmdag has stopped responding, but was successfully recovered. I've searched with google, but I don't get a solution. So I was wondering of someone here knows a solution to my problem. I have a Radeon HD 2400.

item.title: Atikmdag?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:3, topic:204828”]Yea well it’s on my laptop and I cba to open it and put a different in it for a game I barely play.

The strange thing is that it only happens with second life, and no other game.[/quote]
Update your drivers. I have a second life account, and it works fine using my radeon hd 2400 [I think it’s visitek or something].

Read full topic

item.title: Atikmdag?
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

You’re fucked, nothing you can really do.
Buy an nVidia, there’s decent ones (at least for Second Life) on newegg for < $30.

Read full topic
